title: PBE Signups
body: Can Riot ever give us a status on the PBE signup page? it's been three months and no info has been released regarding this. I was approved for PBE and I didn't know until a few days ago and I want to make an account but it's taking forever to fix that site.

replies.body: We don't yet have a date for when signups will be open again, but make sure to check the [**PBE Status**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) page periodically for updates. That'll be your best bet for knowing when they open up again, and I'm pretty sure that PBE acceptance will still apply when they do re-open.
